messages.title: It's a two horse race in Worthing West
messages.content: Elections in Worthing West are always a close finish between the Liberal Democrats and the Conservatives. More and more people are switching to back Lib Dem campaigner Hazel Thorpe this time.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a straight fight between Hazel and the Conservative.

issues.economy: They know that every vote for Hazel is a vote for real action on jobs, to protect our NHS and for lower taxes.
issues.health: They know that every vote for Hazel is a vote for real action on jobs, to protect our NHS and for lower taxes.

contactInformation.address: Worthing West Lib Dems, FREEPOST, RRHX-ETKC-CJAZ, Worthing, BN12 6HE

images.caption: Hazel Thorpe engaging with a constituent.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Help Hazel win in Worthing. How one can help: supporting Hazel on election day, delivering leaflets, making a donation to her campaign, displaying a poster.
